__e: This is embarrassing, but it turns out I only have about $20 cash on me, and the only person in this household who has a chequebook is my husband, and he is still in the city, of course.
I'm sorry, I couldn't help but overhear. This young woman got two checks, and I don't have any.
I go by the office once a month to pick up my check, and I picked her up along the way.
You mean where I picked you up?
Now, when you start bringin' in a paycheck and providing' for this family, then you can make the rules!
And unless you're gonna suspend me or assign me to desk duty and put me on probation, I don't really want to talk about it.
So, those checks you wrote us came out of your own account?
Those disability checks you stole more money than I've saved in my entire life.
How can I be expected to remember every check I've ever written?
I see. Were there any other checks that you might be aware of, that could...
Look, I know the child support checks are late, but, but please allow me to get back to my job.

Just like my child support checks.
She wrote a bunch of cheques out to cash. $25,000 in total.
Tell them to start sending the pension checks, right?
